title: Systematizing LLM Persona Design: A Four-Quadrant Technical Taxonomy for AI Companion Applications
summary: The design and application of LLM-based personas in AI companionship is a rapidly expanding but fragmented field, spanning from virtual emotional companions and game NPCs to embodied functional robots. This diversity in objectives, modality, and technical stacks creates an urgent need for a unified framework.
